Anml - Career design intern
The role

Design Intern

ANML is looking for a design intern to help with visual design and UX on websites, mobile, and software interface design. Anything with a screen is game and you'll gain a ton of digital experience.

You will work directly with the creative team assisting on various tasks around the studio including wire framing, visual design comps, and guidelines. You must be a quick learner, hungry to create portfolio worthy work, and a solid team player.

Different from the big agency life, and far from the cubed existence, ANML’s small team is tucked at the bottom of the Santa Cruz mountains in the historic town of Los Gatos. Just 30 minutes from surf and a steps away from trails, ANML’s location balances the excitement of the Silicon Valley with the calm of nature in our backyard.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

Skills & Experience

  • Assist design team on UX and visual design needs.
  • Understand the needs of our clients and their customers before making design decisions.
  • Be creative, challenge the status quo and find new ways of approaching and solving problems.
  • Present design solutions to the internal team.
  • Evolve skills and styles to adapt to the ever-changing digital landscape.
  • Help develop a culture that includes fun, passion and positive energy.
